messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Hsers
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/30/03 4:22:47 PM, schorsewoman@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/30/03 4:22:47 PM, schorsewoman@... writes:

<< I couldn't believe what I typed! I didn't mean hsers weren't doing
"anything!" I meant they weren't attending activities outside the home during school
hours. LOL. Guess it was a Freudian slip or something! <grin> >>

I figured, but it was fun and funny! Because they so often say unschoolers
aren't doing anything no matter HOW much we do while they're sitting filling in
the blanks and writing practice-reports. <g>

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: Hsers
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, I couldn t believe what I typed! I didn t mean hsers weren t doing anything! I meant they weren t attending activities outside the home during school
messages.messageBody:
Sandra,
I couldn't believe what I typed! I didn't mean hsers weren't doing "anything!" I meant they weren't attending activities outside the home during school hours. LOL. Guess it was a Freudian slip or something! <grin>

Deana
